title: Sherry felicitates Hindu community on Diwali
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP):Vice President of the Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) and Senator Sherry Rehman has extended warm greetings to the Hindu community in Pakistan and across the world on the joyous occasion of Diwali.

In her message, Senator Rehman said that Diwali is a festival of happiness, light and love.

She prayed for peace and goodwill for all Pakistanis, emphasizing the spirit of unity that defines the nation.

Sherry Rehman praised the invaluable contributions of the Hindu community to Pakistan’s progress and prosperity, acknowledging their role in the defense, security and development of the country.

Highlighting the PPP’s longstanding commitment to interfaith harmony, tolerance, and national unity, she said the party firmly believes in the vision of an inclusive Pakistan where all citizens enjoy equal rights.

Sherry Rehman said that the Constitution given by Quaid-e-Awam Shaheed Zulfikar Ali Bhutto guarantees equal rights to minorities, while Shaheed Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto always championed the protection of minority rights.

She said that Chairman Bilawal Bhutto Zardari continues this legacy by promoting the message of solidarity and tolerance.

“Pakistan’s true progress lies in our ability to move forward together as one nation,” Sherry Rehman added.
